title.rendered: Pay Per Click pe timp de criza

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column _builder_version=”4.4.1″ type=”4_4″][et_pb_image src=”http://localhost/ppc/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/wz6saufihk0.jpg” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″ box_shadow_style=”preset6″ box_shadow_horizontal=”23px” box_shadow_blur=”75px” box_shadow_spread=”74px” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ hover_enabled=”0″]

Se aude ca adevaratii maestri in Pay Per Click ai primelor 5 agentii PPC din Romania lucreaza peste program.

Bugetele zboara ca la FOREX si clientii incep sa fuga.

Timpul e scurt si increderea clientilor se cere restabilita rapid, asa ca ne-am dat seama cu totii de pericol: riscam ca PPC sa REdevina „PowerPC” (o arhitectură pe 64 bit de tip RISC).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
